menu.name: Cali Chicken Bacon Ranch™ Pizza
menu.description: Grilled chicken breast, white sauce, smoked bacon, tomatoes, cheeses made with 100% real mozzarella and provolone on a cheesy provolone crust.

menu.name: Fiery Hawaiian™ Pizza
menu.description: Sliced ham, smoked bacon, pineapple, roasted red peppers, hot sauce, jalapeños, cheeses made with 100% real mozzarella and provolone on a cheesy Parmesan Asiago crust.

menu.name: Philly Cheese Steak Pizza
menu.description: Tender slices of steak, fresh onions, fresh green peppers and fresh mushrooms with provolone and American cheeses on a cheesy provolone crust.

menu.name: Memphis BBQ Chicken Pizza
menu.description: Grilled chicken breast, BBQ sauce, fresh onions, cheeses made with 100% real mozzarella, provolone and cheddar on a cheesy cheddar crust.

menu.name: Asian Style Salad
menu.description: Grilled chicken breast.

menu.name: Season Berry Salad
menu.description: Strawberry, blueberry and nuts.

menu.name: Spring Roll
